synopsis.text: In the whimsical world of Class 2-H, the perpetually pessimistic Nozomu Itoshiki, better known as Zetsubou-sensei, endeavors to impart his bleak outlook on life to his students. However, this task proves more challenging than anticipated, as his pupils are far from ordinary. Among them are an unrelentingly optimistic girl, a devoted stalker, a foreign exchange student grappling with split personalities, and an acting class president who strives for perfection due to the mysterious absence of the real president. Amidst these eccentricities, Zetsubou-sensei finds himself entangled in a series of bizarre and absurd situations, leading viewers on a rollercoaster ride of laughter and despair. Will Zetsubou-sensei's students manage to lift his spirits, or will they push him further into the abyss of hopelessness? Only time will tell in this unpredictable and hilarious anime.
